page.title: 12LONG EATON. Facilities.
page.content: Long Eaton has a wide range of facilities to offer, suitable for all ages. In the evening you can enjoy your social life, if you are old enough, in one of the many public hoises, wine bars and nightclubs. For the older person., the facilities available include a Bingo Hall, a bowling green and several Old Peoples Homes, together with a large park. For the more active, there is a swimming pool, and on West Park many sports can be played including tennis, putting,football, and cricket. For teenages there are several Youth Clubs, Discos and a local picture house.
